pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Exploring Multivariate Data via ICS/ICA // Implementation of Tyler, Critchley, Duembgen and Oja's (JRSS B, 2009, doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00706.x) and Oja, Sirkia and Eriksson's (AJS, 2006, https://www.ajs.or.at/index.php/ajs/arti cle/view/vol35,%20no2%263%20-%207) method of two different scatter matrices to obtain an invariant coordinate system or independent components, depending on the underlying assumptions.
